title: Saving the Devil
description: As a self-professed misanthrope and hermit, you’d think you’d be afforded some peace and quiet. Well, you’d be wrong. Then again having the Antichrist bangin’ on your door is sure to rile things up.After a six hundred year streak of bad luck, things are still headed downhill for Sinya Night as she begrudgingly embarks on a half-assed rescue mission to Hell. Oh joy.
author: Keelin Cain
